entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
